summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West from West Ray Street on the west to West Armour Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16344 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
